label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"禽弯曲杆菌性肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"弯杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":27,"text":"嗜热弯曲杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":57,"end":62,"text":"传染性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"肝出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":45,"text":"坏死性肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":47,"end":51,"text":"脂肪浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":71,"end":75,"text":"死亡率低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":80,"end":86,"text":"抗生素类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"禽类","labels":["type"]},{"start":36,"end":37,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"脂肪","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 禽弯曲杆菌性肝炎是由于禽类感染了弯杆菌属的嗜热弯曲杆菌而引起的一类主要以肝出血、坏死性肝炎伴发脂肪浸润为特征病变的传染性疾病，传播能力强，但是死亡率低，可以使用抗生素类药物进行综合性的治疗，可以有效的治疗本病。

label: [{"start":5,"end":13,"text":"禽弯曲杆菌性肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":21,"text":"禽弧菌性肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"弯杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":29,"end":35,"text":"嗜热弯曲杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":39,"end":45,"text":"空肠弯曲杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"幼鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":51,"end":54,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 疾病概述：禽弯曲杆菌性肝炎又称禽弧菌性肝炎，是由弯杆菌属的嗜热弯曲杆菌，主要是空肠弯曲杆菌引起的幼鸡或成年鸡的一种传染病。

label: [{"start":7,"end":12,"text":"坏死性肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"肝出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"脂肪浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":4,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"脂肪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"发病率高","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"死亡率低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"慢性经过","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 本病以肝出血、坏死性肝炎伴发脂肪浸润，发病率高，死亡率低及慢性经过为特征。

label: [{"start":14,"end":15,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"后备鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"大鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 自然条件下，可发生于各年龄的鸡，而以产蛋群和后备鸡群较多发，实验感染时，大鸡也可发病。

label: [{"start":1,"end":11,"text":"腹腔内常积聚大量血水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"出血病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 因腹腔内常积聚大量血水，故又称“出血病”。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"嗜热弯曲杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":20,"text":"空肠弯曲杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":27,"text":"结肠弯曲杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":28,"end":33,"text":"鸥弯曲杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":35,"end":41,"text":"空肠弯曲杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":42,"end":43,"text":"禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 病原：嗜热弯曲杆菌有三种，即空肠弯曲杆菌、结肠弯曲杆菌和鸥弯曲杆菌，以空肠弯曲杆菌为禽的病原菌。

label: [{"start":40,"end":45,"text":"一般消毒药","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 该菌呈S型或海鸥翼形，革兰氏阴性，无芽胞、荚膜，有单极鞭毛，菌体纤细。对热敏感，一般消毒药可杀灭。

label: [{"start":5,"end":6,"text":"禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":12,"text":"嗜热弯杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 流行特点：禽是嗜热弯杆菌最重要的贮存宿主。

label: [{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 本病主要通过染菌粪便、污染的饲料、饮水等水平传播途径而经消化道感染。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"空肠弯杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":39,"end":42,"text":"小母鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"母鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":63,"end":66,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 空肠弯杆菌在雏鸡间有很可的横向传播能力，自然感染发病的仅见于鸡群，以将近开产的小母鸡和产蛋数月的母鸡最易感，雏鸡可感染并带菌，成年鸡也可发病。

label: [{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":25,"end":30,"text":"空肠弯杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":31,"end":36,"text":"结肠弯杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 临床症状：病鸡的临诊症状严重程度取决于感染的剂量、空肠弯杆菌或结肠弯杆菌的菌株、宿主的年龄、同时发生的环境、应激因素或并发的其他疾病，以及免疫情况。

label: [{"start":3,"end":10,"text":"免疫抑制性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"弯杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 一引起免疫抑制性疾病会增强弯杆菌的致病力。

label: [{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"缓慢发作","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"持续期长","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 本病的潜伏期约为2天，以缓慢发作和持续期长为特征。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":13,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 通常鸡群中只有一只小部分鸡在同一时间内表现症状，此病可持续数周，死亡率2%—15%。

label: [{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"精神倦怠","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"呆立缩颈","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"闭眼","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":49,"text":"对周围环境敏感性降低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":56,"text":"羽毛杂乱无光","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":56,"text":"杂乱无光","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":57,"end":65,"text":"肛门周围污染粪便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":71,"end":76,"text":"黄褐色腹泻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":71,"end":74,"text":"黄褐色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":80,"end":83,"text":"浆糊性","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":87,"end":89,"text":"水样","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":96,"end":100,"text":"急性死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":35,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":38,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"肛门","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":63,"end":65,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":74,"end":75,"text":"腹","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":92,"end":93,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":68,"end":69,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 急性型发病初期，有的不见明显症状，雏鸡群精神倦怠、沉郁，严重者呆立缩颈、闭眼，对周围环境敏感性降低；羽毛杂乱无光，肛门周围污染粪便；多数鸡先呈黄褐色腹泻，然后呈浆糊性，继而呈水样，部分鸡此时即急性死亡。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"脱水","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"消瘦","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"心力衰竭","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 亚急性型呈现脱水，消瘦，陷入亚病质，最后心力衰竭而死亡。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"精神萎顿","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"鸡冠发白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"发白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"干燥","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"萎缩","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":26,"text":"鳞片状皮屑","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"逐渐消瘦","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":38,"text":"饲料消耗减低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 慢性型精神萎顿、鸡冠发白、干燥、萎缩，可见鳞片状皮屑，逐渐消瘦，饲料消耗减低。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"急性经过","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"青年蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"亚急性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"慢性经过","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":29,"text":"开产期延迟","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"沙壳蛋","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":43,"text":"软壳蛋较多","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":55,"text":"不易达到预期的产蛋高峰","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 雏鸡常呈急性经过。青年蛋鸡常呈亚急性或慢性经过，开产期延迟，产蛋初期沙壳蛋、软壳蛋较多，不易达到预期的产蛋高峰。

label: [{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"慢性经过","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"产蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"消化不良","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":27,"text":"因轻度中毒性肝营养不良","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"自体中毒","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":45,"text":"产蛋率显著下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":58,"end":68,"text":"营养不良性消瘦而死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":74,"end":78,"text":"发育迟缓","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":79,"end":83,"text":"增重缓慢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 产蛋鸡呈慢性经过，消化不良，后期因轻度中毒性肝营养不良而导致自体中毒，表现为产蛋率显著下降，达25%—35%，甚至因营养不良性消瘦而死亡。肉鸡则全群发育迟缓，增重缓慢。

label: [{"start":14,"end":21,"text":"肝脏开头不规则","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"不规则","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"土黄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"质脆","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":44,"text":"有大小不等的出血点和出血斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":55,"text":"散布星状坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":56,"end":65,"text":"菜花样黄白色坏死区","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":68,"end":77,"text":"肝被膜下有出血囊肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":73,"end":77,"text":"出血囊肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":79,"end":86,"text":"肝破裂而大出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":80,"end":82,"text":"破裂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":83,"end":86,"text":"大出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":68,"end":71,"text":"肝被膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":79,"end":80,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病理变化：主要病变见于肝脏，肝脏开头不规则，肿大、土黄、质脆、有大小不等的出血点和出血斑，且表现散布星状坏死灶及菜花样黄白色坏死区，有的肝被膜下有出血囊肿，或肝破裂而大出血。

label: [{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":64,"end":65,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 值得注意的是，表现临诊症状的病鸡不到10%在肝有肉眼病变，即使表现病变，也不易在一个病变肝脏上见到全部典型病变，应剖检一定数量的鸡才能观察到不同阶段的典型病变。

label: [{"start":3,"end":8,"text":"肝脏稍肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"边缘钝圆","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"淡红褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":37,"text":"肝被膜常见较多的针尖样出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"血肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":48,"text":"肝破裂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"破裂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":61,"text":"肝表现附有大的血凝块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":74,"text":"腹腔积聚大量血水和血凝块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":26,"text":"肝被膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":46,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":51,"end":52,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 急性型肝脏稍肿大，边缘钝圆，瘀血，呈淡红褐色，肝被膜常见较多的针尖样出血点，偶见血肿，甚至肝破裂，致使肝表现附有大的血凝块或腹腔积聚大量血水和血凝块。

label: [{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":1,"end":17,"text":"表面常见少量针尖黄白色星状坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"无光泽","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":34,"text":"与周围正常肝组织界限明显","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"肝组织","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肝表面常见少量针尖黄白色星状坏死灶，无光泽，与周围正常肝组织界限明显。

label: [{"start":3,"end":10,"text":"肝细胞排列紊乱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"排列紊乱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":19,"text":"明显的颗粒变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"轻度坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"肝细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 镜检，肝细胞排列紊乱，呈明显的颗粒变性和轻度坏死。

label: [{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"窦状隙","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"细菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":24,"text":"中央静脉瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":42,"text":"汇管区小叶间动脉管壁平滑肌玻璃样变","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":48,"text":"纤维素样变","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":17,"text":"细菌栓塞集落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"栓塞集落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"中央静脉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":38,"text":"汇管区小叶间动脉管壁平滑肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"玻璃样变","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 多数病列在窦状隙可见到细菌栓塞集落，中央静脉瘀血，汇管区小叶间动脉管壁平滑肌玻璃样变或纤维素样变。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"汇管区","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"肝小叶","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":27,"text":"异嗜性细胞或淋巴细胞浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":20,"text":"异嗜性细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"淋巴细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 汇管区和肝小叶内的坏死灶内偶见异嗜性细胞或淋巴细胞浸润。

label: [{"start":3,"end":8,"text":"过氧化物酶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"窦状隙","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"弯杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"栓塞集落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":31,"text":"菌体棕褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"棕褐色","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 用免疫过氧化物酶染色，在窦状隙内可见弯杆菌栓塞集落，菌体棕褐色。

label: [{"start":4,"end":14,"text":"肝脏呈不同程度的肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"红黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":34,"text":"黄褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"质地脆弱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 亚急性型肝脏呈不同程度的肿大，病变重者肿大1—2倍，呈红黄色或黄褐色，质地脆弱。

label: [{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":16,"text":"散在或密布针尖大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":41,"text":"小米粒大乃至黄豆粒大灰黄色或灰白色边缘不整的病灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":34,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"病灶","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 在肝脏表现和切面散在或密布针尖大、小米粒大乃至黄豆粒大灰黄色或灰白色边缘不整的病灶。

label: [{"start":12,"end":17,"text":"菜花样病灶","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 有的病例病灶互相融合形成菜花样病灶。

label: [{"start":3,"end":10,"text":"肝细胞排列紊乱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"颗粒变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":26,"text":"轻度脂肪变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"空泡变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"排列紊乱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"肝细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 镜检，肝细胞排列紊乱，呈明显的颗粒变性、轻度脂肪变性和空泡变性。

label: [{"start":25,"end":30,"text":"胆小管增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"胆小管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"肝小叶","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"坏死增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"脱落","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 肝小叶内散在大小不一、形态不规则的坏死增生与脱落，胆小管增生。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"汇管区","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"小叶","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"异嗜细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"淋巴细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":26,"text":"浆细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":28,"text":"少量浆细胞浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":38,"text":"髓细胞样细胞增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":36,"text":"髓细胞样细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 汇管区和小叶间有多量的异嗜细胞、淋巴细胞，少量浆细胞浸润以及髓细胞样细胞增生。

label: [{"start":3,"end":8,"text":"过氧化物酶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":11,"end":16,"text":"空肠弯杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"肝细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":31,"text":"脂肪变性区","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"窦状隙","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 用免疫过氧化物酶染色，空肠弯杆菌位于肝细胞内、坏死、脂肪变性区、窦状隙等内。

label: [{"start":3,"end":8,"text":"肝体积稍小","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"边缘较锐利","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":23,"text":"肝实质脆弱或硬化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"硬化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"脆弱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":33,"text":"星状坏死灶相互连接","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"网络状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":54,"text":"坏死灶布满整个肝实质内","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":62,"text":"网格状坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":63,"end":73,"text":"坏死灶黄白色至灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":66,"end":69,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":70,"end":73,"text":"灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":4,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":16,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":51,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 慢性型肝体积稍小，边缘较锐利，肝实质脆弱或硬化，星状坏死灶相互连接，呈网络状，切面发现坏死灶布满整个肝实质内，也呈网格状坏死，坏死灶黄白色至灰黄色。这是肉眼诊断本病的依据。

label: [{"start":8,"end":13,"text":"不规则坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":28,"text":"大量淋巴细胞及网状细胞增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"淋巴细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"网状细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 镜检，较大范围的不规则坏死，有大量淋巴细胞及网状细胞增生。

label: [{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"胆囊肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":25,"text":"充盈浓稠胆汁","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":35,"text":"胆囊粘膜上局部坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"局部坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":46,"text":"异嗜性细胞浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":58,"text":"粘膜上皮增生性变化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"胆囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"胆汁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"胆囊粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":44,"text":"异嗜性细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"粘膜上皮","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":58,"text":"增生性变化","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 各种类型均可能出现的病变有：胆囊肿大，充盈浓稠胆汁，胆囊粘膜上局部坏死，周围有异嗜性细胞浸润，并有粘膜上皮增生性变化。

label: [{"start":4,"end":10,"text":"间质性心肌炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":19,"text":"心肌纤维脂肪变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"崩解","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"心肌纤维","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"脂肪变性","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 心脏出现间质性心肌炎，心肌纤维脂肪变性甚至坏死、崩解。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"脾脏肿大明显","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"黄白色坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":24,"text":"斑驳状外观","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":40,"text":"非特异性肉芽肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"脾脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 脾脏肿大明显，表现有黄白色坏死灶，呈现斑驳状外观，个别慢性病例可见非特异性肉芽肿。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"肾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"黄褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":20,"text":"膜性肾小球肾炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":35,"text":"间质性肾炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":29,"text":"肾小球坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"肾小球","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肾脏肿大，呈黄褐色或苍白，膜性肾小球肾炎，有是见肾小球坏死和间质性肾炎。

label: [{"start":0,"end":9,"text":"卵巢的卵泡发育停止","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"变形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"卵巢","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"卵泡","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"发育停止","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 卵巢的卵泡发育停止，甚至萎缩、变形等。

label: [{"start":53,"end":57,"text":"拌料饲喂","labels":["control"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"金霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":35,"end":42,"text":"磺胺二甲基嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":50,"end":53,"text":"土霉素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 防制要点：预防在每吨饲料中加100～600克金霉素，或0.1～0.2%磺胺二甲基嘧啶饮水，或0.2%土霉素拌料饲喂。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"发现病鸡及时淘汰","labels":["control"]},{"start":16,"end":22,"text":"彻底清洗消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":26,"end":34,"text":"全进全出饲养方式","labels":["control"]}]
text: 发现病鸡及时淘汰，对污染场所进行彻底清洗消毒。并采取全进全出饲养方式。

label: [{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"红霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"强力霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"庆大霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"卡那霉素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 治疗可用红霉素、强力霉素、庆大霉素、卡那霉素等。

label: [{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"食中毒菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"免疫制剂","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 本病有公共卫生意义，为人的食中毒菌。本病暂无免疫制剂。
